RunSynchronousCommand.Path: cmd.exe /c ">>"X:\diskpart.txt" (echo:SELECT DISK=0&echo:CLEAN&echo:CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY SIZE=100&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL=^"System Reserved^"&echo:ACTIVE&echo:CREATE PARTITION PRIMARY&echo:FORMAT QUICK FS=NTFS LABEL=^"Windows^")"
cmd.exe /c "diskpart.exe /s "X:\diskpart.txt" >>"X:\diskpart.log" || ( type "X:\diskpart.log" & echo diskpart encountered an error. & pause & exit /b 1 )"

Extensions.File: HKCU = &H80000001 key = "Control Panel\NotifyIconSettings" Set reg = GetObject("winmgmts://./root/default:StdRegProv") If reg.EnumKey(HKCU, key, names) = 0 Then If Not IsNull(names) Then For Each name In names reg.SetDWORDValue HKCU, key + "\" + name, "IsPromoted", 1 Next End If End If

#Download Invoke-WebRequest -Uri "https://github.com/PowerShell/Win32-OpenSSH/releases/latest/download/OpenSSH-Win64.zip" -OutFile "C:\OpenSSH-Win64.zip"
#Upack Expand-Archive -Path "C:\OpenSSH-Win64.zip" -DestinationPath "C:\OpenSSH"
# Install powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "C:\OpenSSH\OpenSSH-Win64\install-sshd.ps1"
# Configure Copy-Item -Path G:\sshd_config -Destination C:\ProgramData\ssh\sshd_config -Force
# Run on startup Set-Service -Name sshd -StartupType Automatic
# Fix firewall New-NetFirewallRule -Name sshd -DisplayName 'OpenSSH Server (sshd)' -Enabled True -Direction Inbound -Protocol TCP -Action Allow -LocalPort 22
